content.raw:
I've just done an apt-get update && apt-get upgrade, and now my qual2 run throws this error:
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:414] Unable to download model[model://src_doorway_q2]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:410] File or path does not exist[""]
Error [parser.cc:581] Unable to find uri[model://src_doorway_q2]
[Err] [Qual2Plugin.cc:52] Joint [src_doorway_q2::hinge] not found
I tried redownloading https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/get/default.tar.gz, but neither that, nor anything I could find in the commit logs there seemed to have those models.

(In addition to seeing those errors, the robot never appears in gazebo; I presume the two are related).
content.html:
I've just done an apt-get update && apt-get upgrade, and now my qual2 run throws this error: [Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:414] Unable to download model[model://src_doorway_q2] [Err] [SystemPaths.cc:410] File or path does not exist[""] Error [parser.cc:581] Unable to find uri[model://src_doorway_q2] [Err] [Qual2Plugin.cc:52] Joint [src_doorway_q2::hinge] not found I tried redownloading https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/get/default.tar.gz, but neither that, nor anything I could find in the commit logs there seemed to have those models.

(In addition to seeing those errors, the robot never appears in gazebo; I presume the two are related).
